name: Geocorp
description:
GeoCorp

Welcome to a future where humans are nowhere to be seen and the earth is populated by robots. You are a hardworking miner in a volcano, but from the vibrations of the earth you deduce it’s going to erupt soon… 

Try climbing to the top to meet your boss in time! Use items to help you on your journey, such as a grappling gun, a pic axe or a pair of super jumping boots. 

Explore the different parts of the volcano, avoid the rising lava and swing to the top to face the boss of Geocorp in an epic final battle! 

This is Geocorp, my final project from a game programming course. It was made in a month in pairs, so my classmate and I had to rush it a bit. Even though there are some bugs, this demo is fully playable, with seven levels in three different styles and mechanics. 

This is our first project and we have put a lot of work into it, all feedback will be well received. 

Thank you very much for downloading/playing this game! 

Game Controls

It also supports Game Controller.

A = Jump

X = Attack/Boost

B = Grapple

Y = Activate Item

Left Stick = Movement

Start  = Pause
